caption:
Coming from a family of immigrants, Canada has afforded us many opportunities and privileges that have helped shape the way our lives are today, including the opportunity to launch Bombay Beauty Co, a brand that has allowed us to celebrate our heritage and work on something that we are passionate about every single day.

However, this is not the lived experience of all Canadians, especially Indigenous peoples, whose land we live, work, and benefit from.

This July 1st, not only should we be supporting Indigenous businesses, taking the time to re-learn Canada’s dark history, and reflecting on its recent actions, we should be uplifting Indigenous voices, educating others, and challenging the narrative where we can. 

Our mantra is LOVE, and as a cause that is very close to our heart, a portion of all @bombaybeautyco sales will go towards the Indian Residential School Survivors Society (IRSSS) throughout the month of July to support Indigenous families that have been impacted by the residential school system. 

And we hope you, too, can help us support the cause in whatever way you can.

24/7 support is available for anyone affected by the effects of residential schools at 1-800-721-0066 🖤
